trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows label control that can display hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 標籤控制項，可顯示超連結 (Hyperlink)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>控制項取代，並將功能加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> controls are retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項是被保留為回溯相容性及未來使用，如果您選擇。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control with the exception that it can display a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項是類似於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>與例外狀況，它可以顯示超連結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Multiple hyperlinks can be specified in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定多個超連結控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: Each hyperlink can perform a different task within an application.
trans-unit.target: 每個超連結可以執行應用程式中不同的工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a hyperlink to display a Web site in Microsoft Internet Explorer or to load a log file associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用超連結，在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中顯示的網站，或以載入應用程式相關聯的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Each hyperlink displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class.
trans-unit.target: 每個顯示的超連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項是的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class defines display information, state, and location of the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別會定義顯示的資訊、 狀態和超連結的位置。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class enables you to associate information, such as a URL to display, with the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別可讓您建立關聯的資訊，例如若要顯示，與超連結 URL。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a hyperlink within the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event is raised, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object representing the hyperlink that was clicked is passed as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs> object that is passed as a parameter to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下控制項中的超連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>就會引發事件，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>物件代表已按下超連結的一部分傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs>做為參數傳遞至事件處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object associated with the hyperlink that was clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此物件來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>使用者已按下超連結相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: All hyperlinks contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class instance for the control.
trans-unit.target: 所有內含的超連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制會儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>控制項的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式新增的超連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The quickest way is to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 最快的方式是指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>並將它指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to specify a single hyperlink within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您指定超連結控制項的文字中。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple hyperlinks, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class by accessing the collection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入多個超連結，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別藉由存取透過集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，或指定連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control has a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項有單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，以左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: To prevent tab navigation to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免索引標籤巡覽至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, be aware that adding new links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A> property to `true` again.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，將新連結加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合將會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop%2A>屬性`true`一次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> provides a number of properties that enable you to define the display appearance of hyperlinks in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>提供許多可讓您定義的顯示外觀的超連結控制項中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties define the colors used when displaying a hyperlink in various states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性會定義用來顯示各種狀態的超連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> property defines the display of the underline that is associated with a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>屬性會定義超連結相關聯的底線顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by opening a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>開啟網站上的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 類別預設的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示作用中連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示作用中連結顯示的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <see langword="Color.Red" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是由系統指定，這個色彩通常是 <see langword="Color.Red" />。

trans-unit.source: An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 作用中連結會是正在被按下的連結。

trans-unit.source: This is similar to the depressed state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 這是類似於使用的狀態的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定程序在按下連結時，將會顯示在的連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> specifies the color of all links displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確連結正在被按下。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> property using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例將它貼在空白表單和呼叫`InitializeLinkLabel`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，將會在參考 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 屬性時呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 注意： 若要取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入隨.NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Notes to Inheritors: When overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> in a derived class, you should not call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承者注意事項： 在覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the .NET Framework, this should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 .NET Framework 呼叫，控制項不應呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes should always call <see langword="base.createHandle" /> when overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法時，繼承類別應該一直呼叫 <see langword="base.createHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a disabled link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示停用連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color when displaying a disabled link.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示用來顯示停用連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color for links that are disabled in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定的色彩中已停用的連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: Disabled links do not cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 已停用的連結並不會造成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: All links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> are initially displayed with the color defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>最初顯示在定義的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結已停用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the range in the text to treat as a link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定被視為連結的文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> that represents the area treated as a link.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" />，表示被視為連結的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property provides a quick way to specify a single hyperlink to display in the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性提供快速的方法來指定單一的超連結，可顯示的文字中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> object provides properties that specify the starting position of the link within the text of the control and the length of text for the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>物件提供屬性，指定控制項的文字和超連結文字的長度內連結的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, the hyperlink is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定超連結時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，超連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property converts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> object assigned to it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object that is stored within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性轉換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>物件指派給要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>會儲存在集合內的物件。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple hyperlinks to the text of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將多個超連結加入至控制項的文字，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property enables you to access the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>, which stores the links specified for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性可讓您存取的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>，它會儲存為控制項指定的連結。

trans-unit.source: This method of adding links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> also enables you to specify data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property that is associated with the link being created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法加入連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>也可讓您指定的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>所建立的連結與相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property can be used to store the location of a file to display or the address of a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性可以用來儲存要顯示之檔案的位置或網站的位址。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，或指定連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property always returns the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>, regardless of how the hyperlink was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性一律會傳回第一個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>，不論超連結新增至集合的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> will differ if you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Text%2A> property contains double-byte characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>會不同，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Text%2A>屬性包含雙位元組字元。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>, it will return the number of bytes in the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>，它會傳回字串中的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will return the number of actual characters.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回實際的字元數。

trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> object is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> 屬性小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> object is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> 屬性小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示連結的行為。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="LinkBehavior.SystemDefault" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您在控制項中顯示時，指定連結的行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想滑鼠指標位在連結時，才會顯示與底線的連結，您可以設定此屬性`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 多個可以與連結相關聯的行為的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>。

trans-unit.source: A value is assigned that is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a link is clicked within the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下控制項中的連結時。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event is handled to perform tasks when the user clicks on a link in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>處理事件，以執行工作，當使用者按一下控制項中的連結。

trans-unit.source: The event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event is passed an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs> class that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object that is associated with the link that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>事件傳遞的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs>類別，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>已按下連結相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use information specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class to determine which link was clicked or what type of task to perform when the link is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用資訊中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別以決定何種連結已按下或已按下 哪種類型的工作執行時的連結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> object defined with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A> property set to the string www.microsoft.com, you can use this information in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event to display the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>物件以定義其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.LinkData%2A>屬性設定為字串 www.microsoft.com，您可以使用這項資訊的事件處理常式中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>來顯示網站的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示一般連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color used to displaying a normal link.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示用來顯示一般連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <see langword="Color.Blue" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是由系統指定，這個色彩通常是 <see langword="Color.Blue" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color that is initially displayed for all links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定最初顯示中的所有連結的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text of the link is not shown properly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，連結的文字不會正確顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of links contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 中包含的連結集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection" /> that represents the links contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 控制項中包含的連結。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control can display any number of links within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項可以顯示任何數目的控制項文字內的連結。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> instance associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> that represents the collection of links displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>與相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>表示控制項中顯示的連結集合。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class to add, remove, and find links in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以使用的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別來新增、 移除和尋找集合中的連結。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the types of tasks you can perform with the link collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊的工作類型的連結集合，您可以執行，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is created, a default hyperlink that contains all the text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>建立控制項時，預設的超連結，其中包含內的所有文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default link by specifying a new link area with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property, or specify a link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定新的連結區域，以覆寫此預設連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性，或指定連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove the default hyperlink by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除預設的超連結使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need to specify more than one link to display within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要指定一個以上的連結來顯示內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否應該將連結顯示為已瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果連結應顯示為已瀏覽則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項並不會自動代表連結是瀏覽過的連結。

trans-unit.source: To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將連結顯示為已瀏覽的連結，您可以設定這個屬性的值`true`事件處理常式中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽過的連結會顯示使用中指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Once the form containing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control is closed, the "all display" state associated with the link is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 一次表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制已關閉、 刪除與連結相關聯的 「 所有顯示 」 狀態。

trans-unit.source: In order to retain the display state of the link, you need to store the display state of the link in a registry setting associated with your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留連結的顯示狀態，您要連結的顯示狀態儲存在您的應用程式相關聯的登錄設定。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects the first link defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響定義中的第一個連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one link specified in the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.Visited%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個控制項中指定的連結，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link.Visited%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can access all the links defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取定義中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A> property using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkVisited%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this sample paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例將它貼在空白表單和呼叫`InitializeLinkLabel`從表單的建構函式或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSizeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.OnAutoSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mouse pointer to use when the mouse pointer is within the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定滑鼠指標位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 界限內時要使用的滑鼠指標。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> to use when the mouse pointer is within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> bounds.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> 界限內時要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interior spacing, in pixels, between the edges of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定介於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 邊緣與其內容之間的內部間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> values representing the interior spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值，表示內部間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal coordinate of the point to search for a link.
trans-unit.target: 點的水平座標，用來搜尋連結。

trans-unit.source: The vertical coordinate of the point to search for a link.
trans-unit.target: 點的垂直座標，用來搜尋連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets the link located at the specified client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於指定用戶端座標處的連結。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" /> representing the link located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link" />，表示位於指定座標處的連結。

trans-unit.source: If the point does not contain a link, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果該處不包含連結，將傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine whether a link is located at a specific point within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷連結是否位於內的特定時間點<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> event of the control to determine whether the mouse pointer is hovering over a link in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法中的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>來判斷是否將滑鼠指標停留在控制項中的連結控制項的事件。

trans-unit.source: Once you have determined that the mouse pointer is over a link, you can then display additional information about the link to the user through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> text or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您決定將滑鼠指標是透過連結，然後您可以顯示連結的其他資訊給使用者，透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>文字或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>。

trans-unit.source: Key code and modifier flags.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵碼和修飾詞 (Modifier) 旗標。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consume the key; <see langword="false" /> to allow further processing.
trans-unit.target: 若要消耗按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />；若要允許進一步處理，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message pre-processing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊字元，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出及方向鍵訊息前置處理期間，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the `isInputKey` method indicates that the control isn't interested in the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法`isInputKey`方法表示控制項並不感興趣的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: `processDialogKey` simply sends the character to the parent's `processDialogKey` method, or returns false if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: `processDialogKey` 只傳送至父代的字元`processDialogKey`方法或如果控制項沒有父代會傳回 false。

trans-unit.source: The `Form` class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: `Form`類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: When overriding `processDialogKey`, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫`processDialogKey`，控制項應該傳回`true`以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that aren't processed by the control, the result of `base.processDialogChar` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 機碼未處理的控制，結果`base.processDialogChar`應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以指定要選取控制項的方向，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 會在定位順序中向前移動。<see langword="false" /> 會在定位順序中向後移動。

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 啟動子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性指定定位順序中要選取控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: New left of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新左方。

trans-unit.source: New right of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新右方。

trans-unit.source: New width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新寬度。

trans-unit.source: New height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新高度。

trans-unit.source: Which values were specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter reflects user intent, not which values have changed.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數用來反映使用者意圖，而不是反映變更的值。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 執行設定這個控制項其範圍的工作。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this function to add size restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫這個函式來加入大小限制。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes must call `base.setBoundsCore` to actually cause the bounds of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別必須呼叫`base.setBoundsCore`實際上會造成變更控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl.DialogResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl.DialogResult" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control should behave as a default button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項應該做為預設按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control that it is the default button.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 控制項它是預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control appears the same regardless of whether it is the default button, so calling this method will not change the appearance or behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項就會出現相同，無論它是預設按鈕，因此呼叫這個方法不會變更外觀或行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 產生 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the first link in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> to be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會導致中的第一個連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can tab to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出使用者是否可以用定位鍵移至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can tab to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />;otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以用定位鍵移至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A> property is `true` by default, as long as there is at least one link of greater than zero length in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A>屬性是`true`根據預設，只要至少一個連結的長度大於零的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control has a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制項有單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: However, each link of greater than zero length gets its own tab stop, in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 不過，每個連結的長度大於零會取得自己定位停駐點，以左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: To prevent tab navigation to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免索引標籤巡覽至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控制，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, be aware that adding new links to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> collection will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A> property to `true` again.
trans-unit.target: 不過，請注意，將新連結加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>集合將會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStop%2A>屬性`true`一次。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TabStop" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStopChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStopChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> named `LinkLabel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>名為`LinkLabel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStopChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.TabStopChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定要使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 還是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> covers the entire text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>涵蓋整個文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, text such as "abcd " is rendered with the trailing space underlined.
trans-unit.target: 例如，例如"abcd"的文字會轉譯與句尾空格加上底線。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> does not cover the entire text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>並未涵蓋完整的文字。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有參數的方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示先前已瀏覽連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示用來顯示已瀏覽連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is specified by the system, typically this color is <see langword="Color.Purple" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是由系統指定，這個色彩通常是 <see langword="Color.Purple" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the `LinkLabel`<xref:System.Windows.Forms> that have been visited by the user.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩`LinkLabel` <xref:System.Windows.Forms> ，瀏覽過的使用者。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of colors associated with a link.
trans-unit.target: 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。

trans-unit.source: All links in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> are initially displayed with the color defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有連結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>最初顯示在定義的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property enables you to specify the color of the link when it is in the process of being clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.ActiveLinkColor%2A>屬性可讓您它正在被按下時，指定連結的色彩。

trans-unit.source: When a link is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A> is used to display the link in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 停用連結時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>用來將連結顯示為停用狀態。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結顯示為已瀏覽連結時。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>類別，具有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定義的區段，以在表單上顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>屬性，以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 其他連結加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>啟動 Web 瀏覽器的超連結，並顯示事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>的其他連結。

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified Windows message.
trans-unit.target: 處理指定的 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
